title: Giant 5 bed 3.5 bath in Watertown
posting_body: This fabulous single family feel .. first floor unit with two levels of living, 5 beds and 3.5 bath is truly a gem!.
This spacious unit has a fully applianced eat in kitchen, spacious additional rooms, giant deck of the kitchen and a priceless oversized patio overlooking the bike path and Charles river.
This unit boasts of privacy but also convenience as it’s in walking distance to the highly sought after Watertown square where you will find all the best shops, restaurants and public transportation.
